context: السَلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ هِي تَحِيَّةٌ رَائِعَةٌ
vocabulary.translation: Peace be upon you is a wonderful greeting

context: صَبَاحُ الْخَيْرِ هُوَ التَّحِيَّةُ فِي الصَّبَاحِ
vocabulary.translation: Good morning is the greeting in the morning

context: صَبَاحُ النُّورِ يُضِيءُ يَوْمَكَ
vocabulary.translation: Morning light brightens your day

context: مَسَاءُ الْخَيْرِ هُوَ التَّحِيَّةُ فِي الْمَسَاءِ
vocabulary.translation: Good evening is the greeting in the evening

context: مَسَاءُ النُّورِ يُضِيءُ لَيْلَتَكَ
vocabulary.translation: Evening light illuminates your night

context: أَهْلًا وَسَهْلًا هُوَ تَرْحِيبٌ بِالضُّيُوفِ
vocabulary.translation: Welcome is a greeting for guests

context: أَهْلًا بِكَ هُوَ تَرْحِيبٌ أَكْثَرُ شَدَّةً
vocabulary.translation: Welcome to you is a more emphatic greeting

context: مَرْحَبًا هُوَ تَحِيَّةٌ بَسِيطَةٌ
vocabulary.translation: Hello is a simple greeting

context: مَرْحَبًا بِكَ هُوَ تَرْحِيبٌ أَكْثَرُ شَدَّةً
vocabulary.translation: Welcome to you is a more emphatic greeting

context: كَيْفَ حَالُكَ هُوَ سُؤَالٌ عَنْ حَالَةِ الشَّخْصِ
vocabulary.translation: How are you is a question about someone's well-being

context: كَيْفَ الْحَالُ هُوَ سُؤَالٌ عَنْ حَالَةِ شَخْصٍ آخَرِ
vocabulary.translation: How's it going is a question about another person's well-being

vocabulary.en: I'm fine, thanks be to God:
context: بِخَيْرٍ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ هُوَ الرَّدُّ عَلَى كَيْفَ حَالُكَ
vocabulary.translation: I'm fine, thanks be to God is the response to How are you

context: مَا اسْمُكَ هُوَ سُؤَالٌ عَنْ اسْمِ الشَّخْصِ
vocabulary.translation: What is your name is a question about a person's name

context: اِسْمِي تَلَاوَةُ اسْمِ الشَّخْصِ
vocabulary.translation: My name is is the pronunciation of a person's name

context: تَشَرَّفْنَا تَعْبِيرٌ عَنِ السَّعَادَةِ بِلِقَاءِ شَخْصٍ مَا
vocabulary.translation: It's our pleasure is an expression of happiness at meeting someone

context: تَشَرَّفْنَا بِكَ تَعْبِيرٌ عَنِ السَّعَادَةِ بِلِقَاءِ شَخْصٍ مَعِينٍ
vocabulary.translation: It's our pleasure with you is an expression of happiness at meeting a specific person

context: فُرْصَةٌ طِيِّبَةٌ تَعْبِيرٌ عَنْ فُرْصَةٍ جَيِّدَةٍ
vocabulary.translation: A good opportunity is an expression of a good chance

context: فُرْصَةٌ سَعِيدَةٌ تَعْبِيرٌ عَنْ فُرْصَةٍ سَعِيدَةٍ
vocabulary.translation: A happy opportunity is an expression of a joyful chance

context: مَا جِنْسِيَّتُكَ سُؤَالٌ عَنْ الجِنْسِيَّةِ
vocabulary.translation: What is your nationality is a question about one's nationality

context: أَنَا مِصْرِيٌّ تَعْبِيرٌ عَنِ الجِنْسِيَّةِ
vocabulary.translation: I am Egyptian is an expression of nationality

context: مِنْ أَيْنَ أَنْتَ سُؤَالٌ عَنْ مَكَانِ الْمِيلَادِ
vocabulary.translation: Where are you from is a question about the place of birth

context: أَنَا مِنْ مِصْرَ تَعْبِيرٌ عَنْ مَكَانِ الْمِيلَادِ
vocabulary.translation: I am from Egypt is an expression of the place of birth
